attributes.action: Investigate the West Ham Football Club's Tevez and Mascherano transfers and subsequent fine of 5.5 Million Pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
West Ham Football Club were found guilty by the Premier League of breaking rules surrounding the signings of Tevez and Mascherano
, I implore the government to step in and open an independent investigation into the subsequent imposed fine of £5.5 million pounds with a view to deciding whether or not a deduction of points should have been awarded.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
